snippet.title: ECHOPLEX Launch Trailer (Full Release)
snippet.description:
Get ECHOPLEX on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/611060/  
ECHOPLEX is a time-bending puzzle adventure with FMV story. 
http://echoplexgame.com
https://twitter.com/echoplexgame
https://www.facebook.com/echoplexgame
